value.title: Elon Musk’s Old Pals Invest in Neuralink to Fund Testing Brain Chips in Humans
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has rounded up his old friends from PayPal and Open AI days to fund his brain-computer interface startup Neuralink’s next phase of experiments to test implantable brain chips in humans and take the company’s first product to market.

value.title: Intel, Ministry of Education launch 'AI For All' in India
value.excerpt: Chip maker Intel on Thursday partnered with Central Board of School Education (CBSE), Ministry of Education to announce the launch of an initiative -- 'AI For All' -- that aims to create a basic understanding of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for everyone in India.

value.title: Chipmaker Ampere to acquire AI startup OnSpecta

value.title: IBM upgrades its Big Iron OS for better cloud, security, and AI support
value.excerpt: IBM continues to fine-tune its mainframe to keep it attractive to enterprise users interested in keeping the Big Iron in their cloud and AI-application development plans. The company released a new version of the mainframe operating system— z/OS V2.

value.title: Qualcomm Stakes Beachhead In Artificial Intelligence With Foxconn Gloria AI Edge Box
value.excerpt: Powered by Qualcomm’s Cloud AI 100 solution, the system is design to support up to 24 high-definition cameras for video analytics applications like traffic analysis, security monitoring and smart retail spaces.

value.title: Semiconductor Chips: Small Tech, Big Impact
value.excerpt: Other than a cellphone or computer, it might have been difficult to believe before that something as small as a computer chip figures so prominently in our everyday lives. Or how the lack thereof could bring entire industries to a virtual standstill.
